message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You can have a smaller share this round, but I'm willing to negotiate
I'm willing to give you a bit more this round, but I'm still looking for a fair split!
I'm still holding out for a better deal, but I'm willing to compromise
I'm getting a bit impatient, but I'm still willing to negotiate!
You're getting closer to my target, but I still want a bit more
I'm not getting any younger, Bob! I need a better deal soon!
You're getting desperate, I can sense it. I'll give you a slight edge this round, but don't think you're getting off that easy
I'm running out of patience, Bob! This is my last reasonable offer!
You're not going to get it all, Alice. I'm taking control of the negotiations
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it or leave it!
It's now or never, Alice. Take this and we can walk away with something, or we'll both get nothing. The choice is yours.
